reviewText:
The DVD has only 5 songs and not in Englisch. Disappointable!!!!
Ulrike R. It was a gift to my aunt in USA

I'm a Il Divo fun but paying $20.00 for this DVD is not worth it since it has onnly 4 songs on it, wait for the full concert. But if you want to go ahead and get this item, buy the CD at Barnes and Noble and they have the cd with this extra DV. Good Luck!!  Or watch it in Youtube!!

I am on the waiting list for this amazing DVD. I saw them sing on the Oprah show tonight!!!! Oh my goodness how wonderful!!!! It filled my heart with joy and wonder..
October 24th 2008...
Lynda Beck
